column3:
I think this is quite pointless, sorry.
Collides with all other changes to these files, and for what reason, just to shuffle some words around.

It also has the potential for generating infinite future PRs (that reflow again and again). So have to tend towards NACK.

Hi Vladimir!

It's totally fine. I just wanted to publish this patch that I kept rebasing locally. Forget about it and close this PR please. I can not close it myself at the moment (email only).

On the other hand your comment about _infinite future PRs_ made me wonder :-)

When I was younger I used to guess worthiness of some software project just by reading its textual plaintext documentat
Thanks @jsarenik, however looks like we are closing again.
